name: Lira
description:
Lira a once sleepy city in the north of Uganda is today known as “the jewel of the north”. And so is this Lugas model for us as well. Very simplistic, but always a fashionable and a must- have in every summer collection. If wandering and dancing along beaches or cities…this one will be a great partner in any crime.

Lugas Shoes is a 100% recycled fashion item. Lugas Shoes protects your feet with a fashionable flip flop, and meanwhile our world with a better solution for a worldly challenge.

For more information about the shoes and social project check: 
www.lugas-shoes.com

name: Kampala
description:
Kampala is a very much green city in the heart of Uganda. The rather rough look of this flip flop is often used by our friends in Uganda, as it serves its purpose on Ugandan rougher roads. You’re a daily adventurist or on the way to your next big adventure? Kampala will be the right choice for you to hit the road then.

Lugas Shoes is a 100% recycled fashion item. Lugas Shoes protects your feet with a fashionable flip flop, and meanwhile our world with a better solution for a worldly challenge. 

For more information about the shoes and social project check: 
www.lugas-shoes.com
